About Me

Hello, I am Agbogun Daniel. I am a front-end Developer. I major in using the Angular framework along side other technologies to develop great user experience for Web applications. I am also skillful in back-end technologies such as Node.js, Express, MongoDB PostgreSQL. I enjoy developing application from scratch, so below is some of the projects i have done which has really helped me gain a confident experience in leveraging the power of angular and other technologies to build great front-end application. I am a quite confident and inquisitive person and i am willing to spend extra hours learning new things!

  • HTML5
  • CSS
  • SASS
  • Javascript
  • TypeScript
  • Angular(2+)
  • Node.js
  • Chrome Dev Tools
